thread.section_title: Medical Device Financing from Elsevier Business Intelligence
thread.title: Capnia raises $10mm in PIPE

title: Capnia raises $10mm in PIPE
text:
Capnia raises $10mm in PIPE Deal Date: Oct-01-2015 / Deal # 201530744 Executive Summary 
Capnia Inc. (technology for precision metering of gas flow) plans to raise $10mm through the sale of Series A convertible preferred shares to Sabby Management LLC, which will purchase stock in two separate transactions. Capnia will initially receive gross proceeds of $4.6mm and then will receive $5.4mm at the second closing. The preferred stock is convertible into 5.4mm common shares at a price of $1.85. Capnia will also issue five-year Series D warrants to purchase 2.7mm common shares at $2.46 per share. The warrants are non-exercisable until the earlier of shareholder approval or six months after the issuance. The proceeds will be used to expand commercial activities related to Capnia's neonatology-focused product line and to advance its pipeline.
